Package graphics

Class ShaderProgram

java.lang.Object
graphics.ShaderProgram
public class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles shaders and uniforms of an item

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ShaderProgram()
    Class constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUniform​(java.lang.String uniform)
    This function adds a uniform to the shaderProgram
    boolean attachShader​(Shader shader)
    This function attaches a shader to the shaderProgram, returns true if attachment is successful, false otherwise
    void bind()
    This function binds the shaderProgram
    void destroy()
    This function unbinds the shaderProgramme, detaches all shaders and destroys the shaderProgram
    boolean detachShader​(Shader shader)
    This function detaches a shader from the shaderProgram,returns true if detachment is successful, false otherwise
    java.util.List<Shader> getAttachedShaders()
    Getter, this function returns the list of shaders attached to this shaderProgram
    int getShaderProgramID()
    Getter, this function returns the shaderProgram's id
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getUniforms()
    Getter, this function returns a Map of the shaderPrograms uniforms containing the uniform names and locations
    void init()
    This function initializes the shaderProgram
    void link()
    This function links the shaderProgram
    void removeUniform​(java.lang.String uniform)
    This function removes a uniform from the shaderProgram
    void setTexture​(java.lang.String name, int slot)
    This function sets a Texture uniform to the given slot the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, boolean value)
    This function sets a boolean uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, float value)
    This function sets a float uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, int value)
    This function sets an int uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, Matrix4x4 value)
    This function sets a Matrix4x4 uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, Vector2f value)
    This function sets a Vector2f uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, Vector3f value)
    This function sets a Vector3f uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, Vector4f value)
    This function sets a Vector4f uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
    void unbind()
    This function unbinds the shaderProgram

      public boolean attachShader​(Shader shader)
      This function attaches a shader to the shaderProgram, returns true if attachment is successful, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform​(java.lang.String name, int value)
      This function sets an int uniform to the given value the uniform must be added to the shaderProgramme before the use of the function
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the uniform to set
      value - the desired value
